target: The restaurant serves alcohol and their food is in the expensive price range.
context: <user>  Hello, could you help me search for a salon in the SFO area please? <system>  Sure, there are 10 salons you might like in the San Francisco area, one of which is called 1512 Barber Shop. <user>  May I know what is their average rating? <system>  Their average rating is 4.8. <user>  Wow, that sounds good! <system>  Would you like me to schedule an appointment with the salon? <user>  Sure, please schedule one at 3:30 pm please. <system>  Sure, and when will you be visiting the salon?<user>  I will visit them on the Thursday next week. <system>  Please confirm your appointment with 1512 Barber Shop at 3:30 pm on March 7th.<user>  Sure, that sounds fine with me. <system>  Your appointment has been made.<user>  Thank you, could you help me search for restaurants which serves up delicious Lobster in that area too? <system>  Would you like Akiko's Sushi Bar which is located in San Francisco?<user>  May I know what is the price range of their food and if they do serve alcohol? <system>
